DOC.criteria: Diagnosis venous insufficiency One partial fullthickness venous leg ulcer 524 sq . cm size without evidence clinical infection Ankle/brachial index 0.8 Duration wound one year Able return wound clinic weekly evaluation Has sign Institutional Review Board approve inform consent Exposed bone tendon necrotic wound base Signs symptom cellulitis osteomyelitis target ulcer Allergy component novel dress compression wrap Third degree burn Vasculitis , severe rheumatoid arthritis collagen vascular disease Receiving antibiotic Pregnant lactating
